title: Parallel Data Fetcher
description: Create a function that fetches data from three 'API endpoints' (simulated with delay) in parallel and returns the combined result. The function should complete in approximately 1000ms, not 2400ms.
hints: Use async { } to start each fetch concurrently
Use coroutineScope { } to create a scope for your async calls
Call .await() on each Deferred to get the results
The total time should be the max of individual times, not the sum

testCases.expectedBehavior: Time should be around 1000-1100ms since all three run in parallel
Triple contains Profile Data, Settings Data, and Notifications
